name: fr.insa.xareus
description: Xareus is a set of tools including a powerful scenario engine and a relation engine that adds complex interaction capabilities resolution
author: INSA Rennes

samples.description: Simple scene using Xareus Scenario to manage Unity interactions
Simple scene using Xareus Scenario Decision tree

Sample scene showing an example of a loop inside a scenario. It demonstrates how to use and manipulate variable stored in the scenario context. Requires the activation of advanced profile to see what is happening in the Scenario Editor (Select in the Scenario Editor: Options > Active Profile > Advanced).
Scene using a Xareus Scenario referencing an external scenario that uses a Configuration function
Scene showing the usage of scenarios in XareusObject. It demonstrates using multiple scenario runners and LocalExternalContextEntry attribute
Simple scene showing the usage of queries in the relation engine
